DOC.brief_summary: Prospective registry of all new comers with Atrial fibrillation
DOC.detailed_description: 12 tertiary care centers will enroll all AF comers. Details of baseline clinical, EKG, echo, and lab data will be documented for all patients. Management is according to the physicians discretion. Patients will be followed up for 1 year for clinical endpoints including cardiovascular death, stroke, heart failure, systemic embolization and bleeding.. Anticoagulants and other cardiovascular medications will also be documented.
DOC.criteria: Admission with atrial fibrillation developing atrial fibrillation during hospitalization for mon AF reason. age 18 or more years. patients welling to participate in the registry. age less than 18 years. patients not welling to participate.
